page.title: 19Playground Games
page.content: {Line to line It-} you have to get from one line to another without getting caught.{Stuck in the mud-}you have three lives.If some one says"stuck in the mud" and touches you then you are on.{Hide and seek-}some one counts to 50 and you have to hide the first one found is the next seeker.{Aeroplane- you have to jump over a rope which is being turned in in a circle if it hits you,you swing the rope.{Hot chocolate- is where someone is"on"at the front, the person who is on turns their back on the others.In bet ween that time the others move a few steps and when the person turns back they have to stand still.If the person sees them move they stand at the side with their arm out.When one of the others touches the hand,you can run away.If seen by the one at the front you go to the front yourself.S.Cameron & W.Ross age9
